vclaim: Under the direction of Dr. Anthony Fauci, the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) division of the National Institutes of Health (NIH) approved the use of taxpayer dollars to fund "cruel and unnecessary" testing of an experimental vaccines and drugs on beagles.
title: Did Fauci Spend Taxpayer Dollars on ‘Cruel and Unnecessary’ Tests on Beagles?
subtitle: Allocated government funds for the experiments reportedly totaled more than $1.8 million.
author: Madison Dapcevich
